data.text: Your lips are like [SIM] a scarlet ribbon,
Your long neck is beautiful like [SIM] the tower of King David
Your breasts are as beautiful [SIM] as two ◄fawns/young gazelles►
My darling, you are completely beautiful;
My bride, it is as though you are in [MET] Lebanon
My bride [DOU], you who are dearer to me than my sister, you have captured my affection [IDM]
My bride, your love for me is delightful!
Being kissed by you is as enjoyable as eating [MTY] honey;
My bride, you who are dearer to me than [MET] my sister, you are like [MET] a garden that is locked
You are like [MET] an orchard of pomegranate trees
and saffron and calamus and cinnamon
You are like [MET] a fountain in a garden,
I want the north wind and the south wind to come,
